AHMED

Email:

OBJECTIVE
To work in a challenging environment where I can better utilize my skills and enhance my experience in
the domain of sales and business development.
WORK EXPERIENCE
BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT EXECUTIVE

Percentage: 80%
MATRICULATION
(2013 – 2015)
Wapda Girls High School, Lahore
(Computer, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry)
Percentage: 93%PERSONAL SKILLS
●
Strong interpersonal skills
●
Eﬀective Listening
●
Ability to negotiate
●
Ability to Multitask
●
Attention to details
●
Professional behavior
●
Time and resource 
management
●
Eﬀective Decision making
ORGANIZATIONAL/ MANAGERIAL SKILLS
●
Business intelligence and marketing skills
●
Hands-on experience in Upwork bidding and utilization of freelancing platforms for lead
generation
●
Knowledge of all the stages of a sales cycle
●
Experience with CRM systems
●
Strong knowledge of lead generation using email campaigns and popular marketing tools
●
Ability to analyze market trends and suggest new ideas/strategies for improving sales
●
Ability to interact and eﬀectively communicate with people from diverse backgrounds
●
Strong persuasion skills that help in maximizing customer satisfaction
●
Good at creating and goal setting and meeting goals, decision making, managing
appointments, team management, and strategic thinking
SEMESTER PROJECTS
CAMPUS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
Subject: Programming Fundamentals, It was developed in C++.
NGO DATABASE SYSTEM
Subject: Database System. It was developed in ORACLE using PHP, HTML, and CSS.
LUDO GAME
Subject: OOAD (Object-Oriented Analysis and Design). It was developed in JAVA.
ONLINE ART GALLERY
Subject: Web Development. It was developed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, AJAX,
JQUERY, and JSON.FINAL YEAR PROJECT
PU E-BUS TRACKING APPLICATION
It is an application that will provide Real-time Bus locations to the students. It is an
Android-based project. The application has two modules; one is for drivers, the other for
students. When a driver opens the app, his real-time location in Firebase is saved. When
a student opens the app, nearby buses within a 3km of radius are shown to the student.
We have also developed a Website for admins who can remove or add buses.
Tools for Android: Java, XML, Gradle, and Firebase Database.
Tools for Web: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, React, Python and MySQL.
input.additional_info: At Acme Corp, we prioritize candidates from diverse educational backgrounds with proven experience in high-pressure sales environments. We welcome graduates from reputable institutions but hold no particular preference for any university. Relocation support is available on a case-by-case basis. Skills assessment will include a practical marketing project to gauge capability in real-world scenarios, complemented by personal interviews to evaluate cultural fit and growth potential.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field
Demonstrated ability in team leadership and mentoring
Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce)
5+ years of experience in sales and marketing roles
